page.title: 02NATIONAL AVENUE AREA.
page.content: This area (06.30) is mainly houses, particularly a large housing estate to the north. This is a particularly attractive area with plenty of grassed areas and a very quiet neighbourhood. Approximately half of the remaining area is sports grounds and play areas, some public and some owned by firms in the vicinity. The remaining land is occupied by industrial estates. The size and type of factory unit varies greatly. The largest estate is of fairly recent construction, one factory being only two months old. The various firms comprise of television distributors, radiator manufacturers, pump makers, vehicle repair shops and haulage firms.
